snippet: Airport guide apps can connect you with decent food, and may help you avoid overpaying for ground transportation.
abstract: Bob Tedeschi App Smart column highlights airport guide apps; notes they can connect the user with decent food, and may help one avoid overpaying for ground transportation.
lead_paragraph: Airport guide apps can connect you with decent food, and may help you avoid overpaying for ground transportation.

headline.print_headline: After Your Airplane Lands, an App Comes In Handy
headline.seo: A Review of Airport Guide Apps - App Smart
headline.main: After the Plane Gets You to the Airport, an App Comes in Handy
